steps.name: CypherCommand
commands:
match (n:esco__Occupation)  where n.skos__prefLabel in [ 'actor/actress', 'administrative assistant', 'immigration officer', 'steward/stewardess', 'residential care home worker', 'chief executive officer', 'civil engineer', 'building', 'construction worker', 'electrician', 'emergency medical dispatcher', 'mixed farmer', 'member of parliament', 'executive assistant', 'police officer', 'postman/postwoman', 'primary', 'school teacher', 'sales assistant', 'social worker', 'train driver', 'waiter/waitress']
unwind n.skos__altLabel as altLabels
create (al:OccupationLabel:Resource {skos__prefLabel: altLabels, uri: "<<ContentApiPrefix>>/occupationlabel/" + apoc.create.uuid()})
create (n)-[:hasAltLabel]->(al)
